name: Spaghetti with Toasted Garlic Breadcrumbs and blistered Cauliflower
description: Easy Spaghetti with toasted garlic breadcrumbs and blistered cauliflower. 30 Min 1 Skillet! Vegan Pasta Meal with toasted breadcrumbs and roasted cauliflower. so Flavorful! Serve with roasted cherry tomatoes/veggies. Vegan Nutfree Soyfree Recipe, Easily Glutenfree

video.name: VEGAN SPAGHETTI WITH TOASTED GARLIC BREADCRUMBS AND BLISTERED CAULIFLOWER - Vegan Richa Recipes
video.description:
VEGAN SPAGHETTI WITH TOASTED GARLIC BREADCRUMBS AND BLISTERED CAULIFLOWER

Get the WRITTEN RECIPE here - https://www.veganricha.com/spaghetti-with-toasted-garlic-breadcrumbs-and-blistered-cauliflower/

SUBSCRIBE HERE: https://www.youtube.com/veganricharecipes?sub_confirmation=1

Easy Spaghetti with toasted garlic breadcrumbs and blistered cauliflower. 30 Min Vegan Pasta Meal with toasted breadcrumbs and roasted cauliflower. Vegan Nutfree Soyfree Recipe

I had been eyeing Mario bataliâ€™s toasted breadcrumb spaghetti when I first happened upon it. The toasty garlic and breadcrumb idea was intriguing. I changed up the process to toast the breadcrumbs and garlic together. The flavor of the mix is enhanced with some lemon zest and pepper instead of cheese. The dish gets rounded up with some blistered cauliflower that enhances the toastyness and balances the garlic and parsley.

I use fresh bread for breadcrumbs in this dish as the breadcrumbs are tastier, less dry and absorb a lot more flavor. Be generous with the garlic, breadcrumbs, toasting time and parsley or other favorite fresh herb!

******MORE PASTA FROM THE BLOG******

VEGAN LEMON ASPARAGUS PASTA: https://www.veganricha.com/vegan-lemon-asparagus-pasta/

CREAMY SUN DRIED TOMATO PASTA WITH GARLIC SOY CURLS: https://www.veganricha.com/creamy-sun-dried-tomato-pasta-garlic-soy-curls/

VEGAN GARLIC PASTA WITH ROASTED CAJUN CAULIFLOWER: https://www.veganricha.com/vegan-garlic-pasta-roasted-cajun-cauliflower/

COOKBOOKS BY RICHA HINGLE (VEGAN RICHA): https://www.veganricha.com/mybooks/

#veganspaghetti #spaghettirecipe #veganricha #easyveganrecipes

recipeIngredient: 10 oz spaghetti ( or other similar pasta)
2 tbsp chopped parsley or other fresh herbs such as basil or oregano or a mix
4 cloves of garlic (, minced or finely chopped)
3/4 cups breadcrumbs made from 2 slices of bread
pepper flakes, lemon juice, olive oil for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the spaghetti according to instruction on the package, rinse in cold water and set aside. You can start the water and add the spaghetti when boiling, around the time the cauliflower is done.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the spaghetti according to instruction on the package, rinse in cold water and set aside. You can start the water and add the spaghetti when boiling, around the time the cauliflower is done.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the Cauliflower: Heat a cast iron skillet over medium high heat. When the skillet is evenly hot, add oil. Add the cauliflower and toss. Let the cauliflower cook for 3 to 4 mins until browning on some edges. Move it around once in between. Add black pepper or pepper flakes, a good dash salt, parsley and toss well. Cover and cook for another 2-3 mins (this will steam cook the cauliflower). Cook time will depend on the stove and the size of the cauliflower. Cook until al dente. Remove from the skillet.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the Cauliflower: Heat a cast iron skillet over medium high heat. When the skillet is evenly hot, add oil. Add the cauliflower and toss. Let the cauliflower cook for 3 to 4 mins until browning on some edges. Move it around once in between. Add black pepper or pepper flakes, a good dash salt, parsley and toss well. Cover and cook for another 2-3 mins (this will steam cook the cauliflower). Cook time will depend on the stove and the size of the cauliflower. Cook until al dente. Remove from the skillet.

recipeInstructions.text: Make the breadcrumbs by pulsing bread in a food processor until coarse crumbs. Heat the same skillet over medium heat. Add olive oil and garlic and cook for 1-2 mins until the garlic is just starting to turn translucent and fragrant. Add the breadcrumbs and toss well. Cook for 6 to 8 mins or until nicely toasted(dark golden, not brown/burnt. Reduce heat if needed for gentle toasting). Stir occasionally.
recipeInstructions.name: Make the breadcrumbs by pulsing bread in a food processor until coarse crumbs. Heat the same skillet over medium heat. Add olive oil and garlic and cook for 1-2 mins until the garlic is just starting to turn translucent and fragrant. Add the breadcrumbs and toss well. Cook for 6 to 8 mins or until nicely toasted(dark golden, not brown/burnt. Reduce heat if needed for gentle toasting). Stir occasionally.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the optional almond flour, zest, salt and pepper and mix well. Reserve a tbsp of parsley for garnish and add the rest to the mixture. Mix well and remove 2/3 of the breadcrumbs from the skillet.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the optional almond flour, zest, salt and pepper and mix well. Reserve a tbsp of parsley for garnish and add the rest to the mixture. Mix well and remove 2/3 of the breadcrumbs from the skillet.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the spaghetti and toss well to coat. If the noodles are drying, add 2-3 tbsp water and toss. Take off heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the spaghetti and toss well to coat. If the noodles are drying, add 2-3 tbsp water and toss. Take off heat.

recipeInstructions.text: Divide the noodles into serving dishes. sprinkle liberally with the toasted breadcrumb mixture and lightly toss. Add some vegan parm if you have. Add blistered cauliflower, some olive oil or lemon juice, generous dash of red pepper flakes and serve immediately.
recipeInstructions.name: Divide the noodles into serving dishes. sprinkle liberally with the toasted breadcrumb mixture and lightly toss. Add some vegan parm if you have. Add blistered cauliflower, some olive oil or lemon juice, generous dash of red pepper flakes and serve immediately.

recipeInstructions.text: This dish is best served fresh as the toasted breadcrumbs are crisp, spaghetti has enough moisture, and cauliflower is crisp and flavorful when hot. Add some roasted cherry tomatoes(see notes) or vegan cheese shreds for additional moisture. If planning to store, then store the breadcrumb mixture separately.
recipeInstructions.name: This dish is best served fresh as the toasted breadcrumbs are crisp, spaghetti has enough moisture, and cauliflower is crisp and flavorful when hot. Add some roasted cherry tomatoes(see notes) or vegan cheese shreds for additional moisture. If planning to store, then store the breadcrumb mixture separately.
